features.title: Project details — Todos tab and Kanban

tickets.title: Populate tickets.md with work items from codebase
tickets.description: Checklist by feature (P0–P3) so Kanban and Tickets card have real content.

tickets.title: Populate features.md from tickets.md
tickets.description: Features roadmap with ticket refs so correlation and Kanban parse correctly.

tickets.title: Keep Sync button validating features.md and tickets.md correlation
tickets.description: Per .cursor/sync.md; show clear sync status and details.
tickets.featureName: Project details — Todos tab and Kanban

tickets.title: Ensure Analysis: Tickets creates both tickets.md and features.md in one run
tickets.description: So feature names and ticket numbers stay aligned.
tickets.featureName: Project details — Todos tab and Kanban

tickets.title: Add request validation (e.g. Zod) to API routes
tickets.description: Return 400 with clear errors instead of 500 on invalid input.

tickets.title: Add API auth for /api/* when deployed beyond localhost
Surface OPENAI_API_KEY missing state in UI
tickets.description: Clear message on generate buttons or after first failure.

tickets.title: Persist run history (metadata + log snippets)
tickets.description: SQLite or JSON; add History view on Run or dedicated page.

tickets.title: Add unit/integration tests for lib and store
Add E2E tests for critical flows
tickets.description: Playwright or Cypress (e.g. run, create project).

tickets.title: Add React error boundaries at layout or route level
tickets.description: Avoid full white screen on uncaught errors.

tickets.title: Accessibility audit and fixes
tickets.description: Focus, keyboard nav, ARIA for custom tables and Kanban.

tickets.title: Project sync / Reload from disk
tickets.description: Explicit reload for local projects vs projects.json.

tickets.title: i18n / locale layer
tickets.description: If app will be used in multiple languages.

tickets.title: Offline / PWA support for browser mode
tickets.description: Service worker; consider sync when online.

tickets.title: Copy Kanban JSON to file in browser mode
tickets.description: When Tauri not available, allow saving JSON to a file (e.g. download).

tickets.title: Export run log to file from Run page
tickets.description: Download log for current or past run.
